UAE sends first ambassador to Syria since conflictThe United Arab Emirates has dispatched an ambassador to Damascus for the first time since the Syrian conflict erupted in 2011, Syria's state media reported on Tuesday, in a new signal of Syria's warming ties with the Arab region. Tue, 30 Jan 2024 15:29:36 GMT 56L3NW47ZNOCFFGSVE3JZ3N6GQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/uae-sends-first-ambassador-syria-since-conflict-2024-01-30/Reuters世界中东
Zelenskiy set to replace Ukraine's top commander Zaluzhny -FTUkraine's President Volodymyr Zelenskiy is preparing to replace top commander Valery Zaluzhny in what would be the biggest shake-up of its military brass during Russia's almost two-year-old invasion, the Financial Times reported on Tuesday. Tue, 30 Jan 2024 15:26:28 GMT NYSOOHJ23BJ55PAFR363QKYVHA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/zelenskiy-set-replace-ukraines-top-commander-zaluzhny-ft-2024-01-30/Reuters世界欧洲
At least 19 dead in Mexico highway crash involving passenger bus -local mediaA fiery highway collision between a truck and a bus filled with passengers in Mexico's northwestern Sinaloa state early on Tuesday killed at least 19 people, according to local news outlet N+. Tue, 30 Jan 2024 15:25:27 GMT TEEVBRIYXZNURC5TSFZGW35LXM https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/least-19-dead-mexico-highway-crash-involving-passenger-bus-local-media-2024-01-30/Reuters世界美洲
Russia says increasing air defence missile productionRussia is increasing production of air defence missiles, Defence Minister Sergei Shoigu said in video footage released on Tuesday, adding there were "key issues" that needed to be addressed. Tue, 30 Jan 2024 15:21:41 GMT M4YSC5ZPYBKHVNJT2GH2V4MQJQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-says-increasing-air-defence-missile-product-2024-01-30/Reuters世界欧洲
Reaction to Pakistan ex-PM Imran Khan's 10-year jail termFormer Pakistani Prime Minister and cricket superstar Imran Khan received a 10-year jail sentence on Tuesday for leaking state secrets in the harshest punishment yet of multiple cases he faces. Tue, 30 Jan 2024 14:48:40 GMT QFCVNZ2MHFKFHHQ3N7W423MBQY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/reaction-pakistan-ex-pm-imran-khans-10-year-jail-term-2024-01-30/Ariba Shahid世界亚太地区
Kenyan president says Haiti mission to go ahead despite court rulingKenya is going to push ahead with plans to lead a U.N.-approved security mission to Haiti, despite a court in Nairobi last week blocking the deployment, Kenyan President William Ruto told Reuters on Tuesday. Tue, 30 Jan 2024 14:43:53 GMT RC7TUBFZQRJIHBZGK43Q2HPUE4 https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/kenyan-president-says-haiti-mission-go-ahead-despite-court-ruling-2024-01-30/Crispian Balmer世界非洲
Ukraine says Russia not handing over alleged POWs bodies from crashed planeA Ukrainian military spy official said on Tuesday that Russia was showing no willingness to return the bodies of dozens of Ukrainian prisoners of war Moscow says died in a military plane crash in Belgorod region last week. Tue, 30 Jan 2024 14:40:43 GMT M5WO2TCNVFKB5NSBA7DOEDTSHY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-says-Russia-not-handing-over-alleged-pows-bodies-crashed-plane-2024-01-30/Reuters世界欧洲
Support for Germany's far-right AfD reaches six-month low after protestsSupport for the Alternative for Germany (AfD) dropped below 20% for the first time since July, a poll published on Tuesday showed, after nationwide protests against the German far-right party over the past three weeks. Tue, 30 Jan 2024 14:38:57 GMT E6UZ6UXY2NIZRPU7EERJ34G5FQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/support-germanys-far-right-afd-reaches-six-month-low-after-protests-2024-01-30/Reuters世界欧洲
Spanish farmers plan February protests as anger spreads across EuropeSpanish farmers' associations said on Tuesday they were planning to take to the streets in February in protest against strict European regulations and lack of government support as unrest continues to spread across Europe. Tue, 30 Jan 2024 14:31:56 GMT SH43RDBWZNPJ7LUZU6MFCJTKDE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/spanish-farmers-plan-february-protests-anger-spreads-across-europe-2024-01-30/Reuters世界欧洲
West Africa's 'Brexit' moment spells trouble for the regionA decision by Mali, Burkina Faso and Niger to quit West Africa's economic and political bloc reverses decades of regional integration, leaving millions of people in limbo, and is likely to deepen the three junta-led countries' ties with Russia. Tue, 30 Jan 2024 13:44:41 GMT BZLP547OBNOGPJDTVLEOQMXRUQ https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/west-africas-brexit-moment-spells-trouble-region-2024-01-30/Bate Felix, David Lewis, Giulia Paravicini世界非洲
France's Macron wants EU to help on farmers' crisisFrench President Emmanuel Macron on Tuesday said he wants the European Union to regulate chicken and grain imports from Ukraine and to allow flexibility on some of the bloc's farming rules to help soothe anger among French farmers. Tue, 30 Jan 2024 12:35:38 GMT BF6TX5OYSFLEHE7OKA3H3S6RJY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/french-farmers-block-roads-with-tractors-press-government-action-2024-01-30/Yves Herman, Marco Trujillo世界欧洲
